text.p: Antares - (built 1983) 135,160 dwt del Qingdao spot trip W.Australia r/v $13,000 daily Brade Carriers.
Ems Ore - (built 1974) 103,332 dwt 11.5/12 on 40 plus 4 del Qingdao mid April trip W.Australia r/v $8,500-$8,750 daily Sinotrans.
Topyield - (built 1996) 72,394 dwt del Ulsan end March trip China r/v approx. $13,750 daily Daiichi.
Pequot - 70,165 dwt 14 on 30.9 plus 1.5 del Montoir ppt trip via Kamsar redel Puerto Vesme $12,500 daily Guinomor.
Navios Bulker - (built 1981) 69,737 dwt 13.5 on 38 plus 1.5 del Hong Kong 23-28/3 seven to nine months trading redel Far East $10,800 daily Samsun.
Oceanic Explorer - (built 1990) 68,849 dwt 13.8 on 29.5 plus 0.2 del Cape Passero 21-26/3 trip via ECSA redel Far East $15,800 daily Safmarine.
Samsun Spirit - (built 1983) 67,368 dwt 14 on 38 plus 2.5 del Taichung 1-15/4 trip via W.Australia redel Japan approx. $12,250 daily Navix.
Menalon - (built 1976) 66,464 dwt 13 on 34 plus 2.5 del S.Korea retroactive 16/3 trip Nopac r/v high $9,000 daily Top Glory (reported).
Minerva - (built 1978) 61,896 dwt 13 on 34 plus 2.5 del Amsterdam early April trip two laden legs via ECSA redel Cont $10,500 daily Cargill.
Arcadia - (built 1973) 22,587 dwt 13 on 24 plus 1.5 del Gibraltar ppt trip via UK redel Bangladesh $7,950 daily Copenship.
Alpha Faith - (built 1984) 37,611 dwt 14 on 28 plus 2 del Wilmington retroactive 16/3 trip via Paranam and Jamaica redel Norway $9,750 daily WBC.
Hydra - (built 1977) 26,715 dwt 13 on 28 plus 2 del Antwerp ppt trip EAF $8,000 daily Sealift.
Cherry Flower - (built 1978) 22,670 dwt del Queensland early April trip S.Korea $5,800 daily plus $80,000 bb Pan Ocean.
